name: ms-price-and-plans
description: Base for REST API using NodeJS/ExpressJS, with Docker or PM2 deployment.
author: Ti Prominas <desenvolvimento@ucamprominas.com.br>

scripts.dev:prominas: export WORKSPACE='prominas' && export NODE_ENV='development' && nodemon --exec babel-node src/app.js --use_strict
scripts.dev:lyraedu: export WORKSPACE='lyraedu' && export NODE_ENV='development' && nodemon --exec babel-node src/app.js --use_strict
scripts.build:prominas: export WORKSPACE='prominas' && export NODE_ENV='production' && npm run clean && babel src --ignore test.js --out-dir ./dist --copy-files
scripts.build:lyraedu: export WORKSPACE='lyraedu' && export NODE_ENV='production' && npm run clean && babel src --ignore test.js --out-dir ./dist --copy-files
scripts.build-homo:prominas: export WORKSPACE='prominas' && export NODE_ENV='homologation' && npm run clean-homo && babel src --ignore test.js --out-dir ./dist-homo --copy-files
scripts.build-homo:lyraedu: export WORKSPACE='lyraedu' && export NODE_ENV='homologation' && npm run clean-homo && babel src --ignore test.js --out-dir ./dist-homo --copy-files
